title: Taken by Midnight
description: In the frozen wilds of the Alaskan interior, former state trooper Jenna Darrow was taken hostage by a deadly vampire who terrorized her for hours, feeding on her blood. But Jenna survived - as an altered being. Now she wants revenge on that vampire, & she must turn to the very race of beings who terrify her the most: the Breed.
author: Lara Adrian
